title: What technology is used in mobile power banks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Power banks are commonplace and with our increasing use of battery-powered equipment: everything from mobile phones to battery-powered headphones, portable speakers, MP3 players can be charged via a power bank now this market is the earphones are coming in Bluetooth type and chargeable so technology changed ... I come at the main point the technology used in power bank is:- The two technologies that are currently used have slightly different properties like that 1st - Lithium-ion 2nd- Lithium-polymer these 2 battery technologies they can store more electrical charge in a given size or volume and are cheaper to manufacture, However, they are more costly to manufacture and as a result they may not suit all budgets.
